rules_text:
{G}{W} REBEL ALLIANCE Play Rebels and their Ewok allies from the original trilogy.
{W}{U} JEDI AND DROID ENTERS Play creatures with abilities that trigger when they enter. Use meditate and repair to do it again.
{U}{B} DARK SIDE Dark side themed instant and sorcery cards power this control archetype.
{B}{R} HATEFUL BOUNTY Complete bounties that deal damage to use your hatred and punish all who stand in your way.
{R}{G} MONSTERS AND HUNTERS Use counters to amp up your threats and put bounties on your opponents threats,
{G}{U} JEDI ORDER Jedi have abilities that trigger when they enter or leave the battlefield. They recur these with the Meditate mechanic returning them to your hand.
{W}{B} SEPARATISTS The Separatist Droid army uses the Repair mechanic to allow you to eventually recast your Droids.
{U}{R} SITH EMPIRE Sith get stronger with the [/i][i]Hate[/i][i] mechanic, granting stronger effects or new abilities if an opponent has lost life from anything but combat damage.
{B}{G} BOUNTY HUNTERS Criminals and bounty hunters place bounty counters on opposing creatures and reward you when those creatures die.
{R}{W} THE WILDS Wookiees, Ewoks, and large beasts use the Monstrosity mechanic to get larger and have abilities that care about being monstrous.
